mapper.select: SELECT board.id , board.deleted , board.created_at as createdAt , board.modified_at as modifiedAt , board.title , board.content , board.author , board.countread FROM board WHERE board.id = #{id}
SELECT board.id FROM board WHERE board.id is not NULL AND board.deleted = #{deleted} AND board.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
SELECT count(board.id) as listsize FROM board WHERE board.id is not NULL AND board.deleted = #{deleted} AND board.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
